This chunk is the introductory section of a Python module that defines various visual transition effects for smoothly transitioning between scenes in a 3D application. It includes the import statements needed for core Panda3D classes, Direct_GUI components, interval-based animations, and asynchronous operations, as well as a docstring explaining the module's purpose of providing graphical scene transitions like fading to a color or sliding between scenes.

"""This module defines various transition effects that can be used to
graphically transition between two scenes, such as by fading the screen to
a particular color."""
